tweets.text:
@Feargal_Sharkey The @EnvAgency put monitors in to monitor the stink coming from a local landfill. Weekend, more complaints than ever. Guess what? They apparently forgot to turn the monitors on.  Are they normally this incompetent? 

 https://t.co/dy1e8Ftqdj

#economicskips truck reg WU68 LXO spewing litter out of open top garbage truck all the way down the A2 from Falconwood coast bound on Monday 1st March at 08:59. Unbelievable lack of duty of care by an authorised waste carrier. What you gonna do @EnvAgency? #nothing #useless https://t.co/GedOIh2787

Our Walleys Quarry website has FAQs & more on the landfill in #Silverdale. It also has an @envagencymidlands update on the record no. of complaints this w'end. We take these v seriously & do not underestimate the difficulty of the situation for residents.

https://t.co/Hz9p8O6J4n

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
If you saw #bbcpanorama on #flytipping earlier - easy to think all waste criminals "get away with it..."

...but remember THESE three? 

Two were sent to prison and had to pay back £226,755 in money "earned..." 

...while the third got a suspended jail term and a night curfew... https://t.co/FIMYTTI3nb

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA Due to the actual number of complaints, I would have expected someone senior from @EnvAgencyMids such as yourself to visit the site, and not make excuses

@Sotlive @piersmorgan @GMB So the EA put monitoring equipment in place to monitor the stink coming from Walley's Quarry Landfill. The weekend passes and we see record complaints about the landfill. Now the @EnvAgencyMids claim the testing equipment was not switched on. Convenient

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC So you are either totally incompetent or corrupt. Would you like to comment on which one that is please?

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Note that not all affected houses were built in the vicinity of the landfill (Galingale) many, if not most, pre-date the approval of the landfill and the associated nuisance. Critical difference.

tweets.text:
Could you use your ecological skills to work with partners / landowners to deliver #NatureRecovery at a landscape scale ?

Apply to become Nature Recovery Lead Adviser in our
West Midlands Area Team▶️

https://t.co/PWUcaFvqpo

 #conservationcareers @EnvAgencyMids @NFUWestMids https://t.co/sYKcomPYIL

tweets.text: @BadgerJellyfish @EnvAgency OMG! 😪

Beautiful day for a drone flyover at Smardale where last year we planted 800 trees in the floodplain for a Natural Flood Management (#NFM) project. Thanks to funding from @EnvAgencyNW and @westmorlanddale https://t.co/bpNx2xawfY

tweets.text:
Good to hear Suzanne Ward on @BBCRadioStoke talking about @EnvAgencyMids #airquality monitoring near Walleys Quarry.

Our 2 units will be in #odour report hotspots & meet monitoring best practice:
- Hamptons Housing Estate site is now live👇
- Silverdale Road site will start asap https://t.co/SGdkEn7Loh
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Are you sure about that? I beg to differ.

ESA are encouraging as many #members as possible to complete the @EnvAgency #WasteCrime survey, which is open for responses until Monday 22nd March | https://t.co/2x35CLnCrN

There has never been a more important time to help the EA to build a robust baseline of data https://t.co/z2N8T5pK1A

Officers in #Lancashire have been working with @prestoncouncil today applying Siltex to Haslam Park, Barley Pit & Tom Benson Way pond.

Siltex is used to decrease organic & oxidisable matter which results in a reduction of silt build up in & ponds is harmless to aquatic life. https://t.co/fj9Kzu9oLU
Another find at low water last night - a very glassy elver at Lee-on-the-Solent @TimSykesEA @EnvAgency @SouthernIFCA @HantsIWWildlife https://t.co/EssIbMRnCR

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @SimonTagg @NewsNBC Please direct your irritation at @AaronBell4NUL

Thank you.

Tribs more of a mixed bag but all with potential for some @WildTroutTrust #TLC.
Some well protected with natural course while others straightened & exposed.
Good to see serious scale tree planting up/s on Gayle Beck. That you @Jack_Hirst3? https://t.co/IusbP3hrXy

Can you help us in our fight against #WasteCrime? 

We've launched a Waste Crime Survey to help us build a better intelligence picture across the country. 

Your responses will be kept confidential and anonymous. 

Complete the survey here: https://t.co/THxMyWjzgX https://t.co/2s6TGQONnn

We have some repair tests lined up for tomorrow. We will repair 2 damages, 1 with rock bags and 1 with a clay solution. We can't wait!
#climateadaptation #floodprotection #emergencyrepair #research Thx @Rijkswaterstaat @EnvAgency @STOWAwater @Defensie @Vlaamsewaterweg @waterschap https://t.co/r15XtPVZsQ
Just to confirm it has been reported to @EnvAgency https://t.co/X2o0y8EtoV
Sorry to say the #RiverWandle looks more like the Swarfega Canal today. https://t.co/fD2vFiMCOU

Attention anglers, the new #FishingLicence images have launched! 

Get set to relax in nature. Buy your new fishing licence at: https://t.co/fx56eQlGOg https://t.co/4fHZRib9Z7

. @EpsomLC @EpsomEwellBC @SurreyCouncil @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency this water is flowing from a pipe into the hogsmill river near the bridge on Ruxley Lane/Scott’s farm road.  Possibly runoff from local housing development work? Another clip. KT19. https://t.co/H7GUMq5IZ6
@paulthoro9ood @EnvAgency That sucks! Is there any way of stopping it now?
